attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Default text which appears in the textarea

attributes.name: validation
attributes.description: Define which type of validation the textarea should perform.

attributes.name: clear
attributes.description: Display a clear button when text is input.

attributes.name: autocomplete
attributes.description: Display autocomplete options when text is input.

attributes.name: rows
attributes.description: Native - Number of vertical rows of text.

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Native - width of the textarea in pixels.

attributes.name: fitparent
attributes.description: Instructs the component to fit to its parent container's width (percent or pixel width).

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Adds a custom icon glyph to the input field, using icons found in mm-icon.

methods.name: bindModel
methods.description: Bind a property on the given model to the input's value.

arguments.name: model
arguments.description: The model object to update with value changes.  If the model has a '.set()' method, .set(property, inputValue) will be used (otherwise the property field of the model will be assigned directly).

arguments.name: property
arguments.description: The property on the model that should be bound to the input's value.

methods.name: open
methods.description: Manually force autocomplete panel to open.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Manually force autocomplete panel to close.

properties.name: value
properties.description: the current input contents as a string

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: the current placeholder value for the input when no contents are set

properties.name: autocomplete
properties.description: determines if the input should implement autocomplete for user entered text

properties.name: data
properties.description: an array of strings to be used for autocompletion when autocomplete is true

properties.name: searchItems
properties.description: an array of strings (subset of data) that have matched the user's input. modifying this array is possible but not reccomended

properties.name: validation
properties.description: the name of the current validation rule to apply to the user input. Valid rues are ('email','alpha','inter','floater')

properties.name: state
properties.description: the current status of the autocomplete panel ('open' or 'closed')

properties.name: overflow
properties.description: determines the behavior for the autocompelte items. when overflow is 'show' the items in the panel area will not constrain to the input width. 'hidden' will truncate the items to the input's width.

properties.name: fitparent
properties.description: determines if the button fits to its parent container's width. when true the button will effectively be width:100%

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: the current status of the textarea. When true user input will not be accepted and the field is greyed out.

properties.name: error
properties.description: Triggers the display of invalid visual state.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Adds a custom icon glyph to the input field, using icons found in mm-icon.

detail.name: value
detail.description: Value of the selected item, usually it's label
